attributes.comment:
I do not believe such a drastic increase in application fees is necessary or wise.
Many people come to this country with little or no resources and struggle to pay
the current application fees. Such a considerable increase will effectively turn
away so many of those who come to this country to build a better future for
themselves and their families.

I understand the desire to process applications expeditiously, but if people are
turned away by the cost, what good will it do to be able to process the remaining
applications more quickly? The goal of immigration services should be to help the
most people, not help people the quickest. I thank you for the opportunity to
comment.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jonathan A. Soper
